scenes.description: Nanashi Mumei performs 'Guitar, Loneliness and Blue Planet' on stage.
A transition montage showing various 3D clips of Mumei and her friends.
Nanashi Mumei, IRyS, Ouro Kronii, and Hakos Baelz perform 'Hello/How Are You' in a split-screen bedroom setting.

subtitles.original: ギターと孤独と蒼い惑星
subtitles.english: Guitar, Loneliness and Blue Planet

subtitles.original: Don't worry, it can loud!
subtitles.english: Don't worry, it can loud!

subtitles.original: 聞いて　聴けよ
subtitles.english: Listen, hear me

subtitles.original: 私は　私は　私はここにいる
subtitles.english: I am, I am, I am here

subtitles.original: 殴り書きみたいな音　出せない状態で叫びたいんだよ
subtitles.english: In a state where I can't let out sounds like scribbles, I want to scream

subtitles.original: なんかになりたい　なりたい　何者かでいい
subtitles.english: I want to become something, become something, anyone is fine

subtitles.original: 馬鹿な私は歌うだけ
subtitles.english: Foolish me, I just sing

subtitles.original: ぶちまけちゃおうか　星に
subtitles.english: Shall I spill it all out to the stars?

subtitles.original: ハロ／ハワユ
subtitles.english: Hello/How Are You

subtitles.original: ハロ　窓を開けて　小さく呟いた
subtitles.english: Hello, I opened the window and whispered softly

subtitles.original: ハワユ　誰もいない　部屋で一人
subtitles.english: How are you, alone in a room with no one

subtitles.original: モーニン　朝が来たよ　土砂降りの朝が
subtitles.english: Morning, morning has come, a morning of pouring rain

subtitles.original: チクタク　私のネジを　誰か巻いて
subtitles.english: Tick-tock, someone wind my spring

subtitles.original: La la la...
subtitles.english: La la la...

subtitles.original: ハロ　昔のアニメに　そんなのいたっけな
subtitles.english: Hello, was there someone like that in an old anime?

subtitles.original: ハワユ　羨ましいな　皆に愛されて
subtitles.english: How are you, I'm jealous, being loved by everyone

subtitles.original: スリーピン　馬鹿なこと言ってないで　支度しなくちゃ
subtitles.english: Sleeping, stop talking nonsense, I have to get ready

subtitles.original: クライン　涙の跡を隠すため
subtitles.english: Crying, to hide the traces of my tears

subtitles.original: もう口癖になった「まあいっか」
subtitles.english: "Oh well" has already become my catchphrase

subtitles.original: 昨日の言葉がふと頭をよぎる
subtitles.english: Yesterday's words suddenly cross my mind

subtitles.original: 「もう君には全然期待してないから」
subtitles.english: "I'm not expecting anything from you anymore"

subtitles.original: そりゃまあ私だって自分に期待なんてしてないけれど
subtitles.english: Well, even I don't have any expectations for myself, but...

subtitles.original: アレは一体どういうつもりですか
subtitles.english: What on earth do you mean by that?

subtitles.original: 喉元まで出かかった言葉
subtitles.english: Words that almost came out of my throat,

subtitles.original: 口を突いて出たのは嘘
subtitles.english: but what came out of my mouth was a lie

subtitles.original: こうして今日も私は貴重な
subtitles.english: And so, today again, I...

subtitles.original: 言葉を食い潰して生きてゆく
subtitles.english: continue to live while wasting precious words

subtitles.original: 何故隠してしまうのですか
subtitles.english: Why do you end up hiding it?

subtitles.original: 嗤われるのが怖いのですか
subtitles.english: Are you afraid of being laughed at?

subtitles.original: 誰にも会いたくないのですか
subtitles.english: Do you not want to see anyone?

subtitles.original: それ本当ですか
subtitles.english: Is that really true?

subtitles.original: 曖昧という名の海に溺れて
subtitles.english: Drowning in a sea called ambiguity,

subtitles.original: 息も出来ないほど苦しいの
subtitles.english: it's so painful I can't even breathe

subtitles.original: 少し声が聞きたくなりました
subtitles.english: I felt like hearing your voice a little

subtitles.original: 本当に弱いな
subtitles.english: I'm really weak

subtitles.original: 一向に進まない支度の途中
subtitles.english: In the middle of getting ready, making no progress,

subtitles.original: 朦朧とした頭で思う
subtitles.english: I think with a hazy head

subtitles.original: 「理由をつけて休んでしまおうかな」
subtitles.english: "Maybe I'll make an excuse and take the day off"

subtitles.original: いやいや分かってますって
subtitles.english: No, no, I know, I know

subtitles.original: なんとなく言ってみただけだよ
subtitles.english: I just said it for no reason

subtitles.original: 分かってるから怒らないでよ
subtitles.english: I know, so don't get mad

subtitles.original: 幸せだろうと不幸せだろうと
subtitles.english: Whether I'm happy or unhappy,

subtitles.original: 平等に残酷に朝日は昇る
subtitles.english: the morning sun rises equally and cruelly

subtitles.original: 生きてくだけで精一杯の私
subtitles.english: I'm doing my best just to live

subtitles.original: これ以上何を望むというの
subtitles.english: What more do you want from me?

subtitles.original: 何故気にしてしまうのですか
subtitles.english: Why do you end up caring?

subtitles.original: 本当は愛されたいのですか
subtitles.english: Do you actually want to be loved?

subtitles.original: その手を離したのは誰ですか
subtitles.english: Who was it that let go of that hand?

subtitles.original: 気が付いてますか
subtitles.english: Have you realized?

subtitles.original: 人生にタイムカードがあるなら
subtitles.english: If life has a time card,

subtitles.original: 終わりの時間はいつなんだろう
subtitles.english: when would the clock-out time be?

subtitles.original: 私が生きた分の給料は
subtitles.english: The salary for the time I lived,

subtitles.original: 誰が払うんですか
subtitles.english: who pays for that?
